answers.answer: Have you been tested for diabetes?What thyroid tests were done and what were the actual results, with reference ranges.  Maybe your thyroid levels are too high for you, even though they are "in range".

question: I was on the depo shot for 13 years and just recently was put on implanon  by my choice. Three months ago lost 16 pounds constantly sweating and hands and feel very cold. Diahearra every morning. I'm so miserable my dr. checked if my thyroid was over acting and that test came back normal. I have no energy to get going in the morning.
title: Thyroid was normal
